summary: A collection of unit and integration tests for the ControlNet image‑to‑image diffusion pipeline, including fast validation of component setup, attention slicing, batch vs single inference consistency, IP‑adapter and XFormers support, as well as slower end‑to‑end tests covering multi‑ControlNet configurations and edge‑conditioning paths.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and compatibility of ControlNet‑based image generation pipelines within the diffusion library, providing confidence for developers and downstream applications that rely on high‑quality, efficient image‑to‑image synthesis.
